description: BIDI mode baseline - get_weather tool call for Tokyo
scenario: User requests weather information for Tokyo via WebSocket - real-time weather data
note: BIDI mode sends events in SSE format over WebSocket. get_weather returns real-time data, content may vary between runs.

expectedChunks.delta:
**Processing Weather Request**

I've determined the user wants weather information for Tokyo. My `get_weather` tool necessitates an English location name. Thus, I'm translating "東京" to "Tokyo" and preparing to execute `get_weather(location='Tokyo')`. The tool's execution is straightforward, so I'm generating the call immediately. I'm eagerly awaiting the weather data now.
